title: Python for the Win
description: An intensive course focusing on Python programming language designed to equip learners with the skills to handle real-world programming tasks and challenges.
learningObjectives: Master basic Python syntax and structure
Learn how to work with Python data types and variables
Work with Python modules and libraries
Create a comprehensive final project using Python

finalProjectDetails.overview: The final project will involve creating a full-fledged Python application that integrates all topics and skills learned in the course.
finalProjectDetails.submissionInstructions: Submit your final project code along with a report explaining your application design and the Python concepts used in it. Please use a private GitHub repository and share the link.
